verse.name: c1
verse.lines: I am so glad that Jesus loves me, newline Jesus loves me, newline Jesus loves me. newline I am so glad that Jesus loves me, newline Jesus loves even me.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I am so glad that our Father in heaven newline Tells of His love in the book He has giv'n. newline Wonderful things in the Bible I see. newline This is the dearest that Jesus loves me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Tho' I forget Him and wander away, newline Still He doth love me wherever I stray. newline Back to His dear loving arms would I flee newline When I remember that Jesus loves me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh, if there's only one song I can sing, newline When in His beauty I see the great King, newline This shall my song in eternity be. newline Oh what a wonder that Jesus love me.
